ModMetaData.name: [NL] Realistic Body
ModMetaData.author: Nals
ModMetaData.description:
This mod only includes textures for vanilla Female and Thin body types. In the future, we plan to include textures for male body types; there are currently no plans to create textures for Fat and Hulk.
Differences from my other retexture mods
I have released 3 retexture mods so far. The concept of the other mods was to make other authors' clothing fit as well as possible. This mod does not take care to make other authors' clothes fit beautifully. Instead, it fits better when combined with clothes for vanilla body types and my Facial Animation Mod.
Notes. Redistribution of this mod data is prohibited.
女性体型(Female)および細身体型(Thin)の画像を変更します。
拙作Compatible Body2との違いは、特殊体系を採用した他Modの服装との互換性を捨てたことです。 バニラ体型に合わせた服装Modとの互換性をより重視しました。 なお、バニラ体系と違い足がありますが、これは私の趣味です。絶対に足は描画します。
今後は他Modの服を違和感なく着られるよう、Apparel Paper Patternを利用したパッチを公開予定です。
注意 当MODの再配布を禁じます。
